name: Folgers Flavors Vanilla Coffee Enhancer, 1.62 fl oz

reviews.name: Folgers Flavors Vanilla Coffee Enhancer, 1.62 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: Yesterday I tried the Folgers Flavors Vanilla flavor enhancer in my coffee and it was delicious. The smooth Vanilla flavor really brightened up my morning.
reviews.title: Brightened up my morning

reviews.name: Folgers Flavors Vanilla Coffee Enhancer, 1.62 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: So I put this into both coffee and hot chocolate and man did it taste amazing the vanilla flavor really does make the difference and give a little extra to an ordinary cup of coffee.
reviews.title: Gave my coffee and hot chocolate and kick

reviews.name: Folgers Flavors Vanilla Coffee Enhancer, 1.62 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: I was picked to sample some Folgers Flavors by Crowdtap and I'm so glad they picked me! I love adding a little extra boost of flavor without the calories to my morning/afternoon coffee. Vanilla has been a big hit with my family and friends. It's just want I need to get me through a crazy day at work. If you're looking for a boost of flavor that you control, then I would recommend this vanilla goodness :)
reviews.title: Vanilla-tastic!

reviews.name: Folgers Flavors Vanilla Coffee Enhancer, 1.62 fl oz
reviews.reviewText:
I received samples of Folgers Flavors Coffee Enhancers from Crowdtap to taste and review. What a find! These palm-sized squeeze bottles are simply divine! No refrigeration needed. No calories or carbs. Best of all, you can use them at home or on-the-go! Put them in your purse, car or even your desk drawer. Anywhere you go, you can always have that perfect
customized coffee.

Adding Vanilla to my coffee is just an enjoyable experience. It is creamy tasting without the cream and sweet. Vanilla enhances the coffee for a delightful taste.

All the flavors are delicious! #FolgersFans #sponsored
reviews.title: Excellent Taste!

reviews.name: Folgers Flavors Vanilla Coffee Enhancer, 1.62 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to find the Folgers Flavors in our coffee aisle that I purchased the three flavors that I commonly get at coffee shops. Vanilla, caramel, and mocha. I was very disappointed in all three. They have a bitter/alcohol/metallic taste that it made the coffee undrinkable. I wish I had only purchased one and tried it before I got all three. So disappointed.
reviews.title: Great in theory - lost in translation
